title: Let's be perfectly honest here. Sylas is not a sexy champion.
body:
Boys without body hair should be considered pre-pubescent, and anyone who finds Sylas sexy is a creep.

Pool Party Graves on the other hand is a daddy.

https://www.mobafire.com/images/champion/skins/landscape/graves-pool-party.jpg 

Look at that beautiful body hair, it will keep you warm on during cuddles and allows Graves to be soft, despite his hard muscles.

Diamond Only, no backtalk.
